opportunities.title: Eliminate render-blocking resources
opportunities.description: Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles.

opportunities.title: Properly size images
opportunities.description: Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time.

opportunities.title: Efficiently encode images
opportunities.description: Optimized images load faster and consume less cellular data.

opportunities.title: Reduce unused JavaScript
opportunities.description: Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity.

opportunities.title: Eliminate render-blocking resources
opportunities.description: Resources are blocking the first paint of your page. Consider delivering critical JS/CSS inline and deferring all non-critical JS/styles.

opportunities.title: Properly size images
opportunities.description: Serve images that are appropriately-sized to save cellular data and improve load time.

opportunities.title: Efficiently encode images
opportunities.description: Optimized images load faster and consume less cellular data.

opportunities.title: Reduce unused JavaScript
opportunities.description: Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity.

opportunities.title: Reduce unused CSS
opportunities.description: Reduce unused rules from stylesheets and defer CSS not used for above-the-fold content to decrease bytes consumed by network activity.
